data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Wuzhong.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Wuzhong who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 99 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hui, Muslim Chinese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hui, Muslim Chinese people.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Wuzhong, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 778,700 people living in Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.section_summary:
the county of Wuzhong, Ningxia Hui, China has a population of 778,700.

We estimate Wuzhong has 59,073 people who might know Jesus, 12,580 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 707,047 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Wuzhong hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
